verses.verse: ( The Demons and the Pigs) ( ( 470 8:28-34 ; 490 8:26-39 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἦλθον <WG2064> ēlthon they arrived εἰς <WG1519> eis On τὸ <WG3588> to the πέραν <WG4008> peran other side τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the θαλάσσης <WG2281> thalassēs sea , εἰς <WG1519> eis in τὴν <WG3588> tēn the χώραν <WG5561> chōran region τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the Γερασηνῶν <WG1086> Gerasēnōn Gerasenes . ( BYZ and TR Gadarenes; GOC Gergesenes)

καὶ <WG2532> kai As soon as ἐξελθόντος <WG1831> exelthontos got αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [Jesus] ἐκ <WG1537> ek out of τοῦ <WG3588> tou the πλοίου <WG4143> ploiou boat , εὐθὺς <WG2112> euthys . . . ὑπήντησεν <WG5221> hypēntēsen He was met by αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . ἐκ <WG1537> ek [who was] coming from τῶν <WG3588> tōn the μνημείων <WG3419> mnēmeiōn tombs . ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos a man ἐν <WG1722> en with πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati spirit , ἀκαθάρτῳ <WG169> akathartō an unclean

ὃς <WG3739> hos [This man] τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κατοίκησιν <WG2731> katoikēsin been living εἶχεν <WG2192> eichen had ἐν <WG1722> en in τοῖς <WG3588> tois the μνήμασιν <WG3418> mnēmasin tombs καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude [even] ἁλύσει <WG254> halysei with chains . οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi no longer οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis - ἐδύνατο <WG1410> edynato could αὐτὸν <WG846> auton - , δῆσαι <WG1210> dēsai be restrained

διὰ <WG1223> dia [Though] τὸ <WG3588> to - αὐτὸν <WG846> auton he πολλάκις <WG4178> pollakis was often πέδαις <WG3976> pedais shackles , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἁλύσεσιν <WG254> halysesin with chains δεδέσθαι <WG1210> dedesthai bound καὶ <WG2532> kai - διεσπάσθαι <WG1288> diespasthai he had broken ὑπ’ <WG5259> hyp’ . . . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou . . . τὰς <WG3588> tas the ἁλύσεις <WG254> halyseis chains καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰς <WG3588> tas the πέδας <WG3976> pedas shackles . συντετρῖφθαι <WG4937> syntetriphthai shattered καὶ <WG2532> kai Now οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis [there was] no one ἴσχυεν <WG2480> ischyen with the strength αὐτὸν <WG846> auton him . δαμάσαι <WG1150> damasai to subdue

καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv διὰ <WG1223> dia kept παντὸς <WG3956> pantos vvv νυκτὸς <WG3571> nyktos Night καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡμέρας <WG2250> hēmeras day ἐν <WG1722> en in τοῖς <WG3588> tois the μνήμασιν <WG3418> mnēmasin tombs καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐν <WG1722> en in τοῖς <WG3588> tois the ὄρεσιν <WG3735> oresin mountains ἦν <WG1510> ēn he κράζων <WG2896> krazōn crying out καὶ <WG2532> kai and κατακόπτων <WG2629> katakoptōn cutting ἑαυτὸν <WG1438> heauton himself λίθοις <WG3037> lithois with stones .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai When ἰδὼν <WG3708> idōn [the man] saw τὸν <WG3588> ton - Ἰησοῦν <WG2424> Iēsoun Jesus ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from μακρόθεν <WG3113> makrothen a distance , ἔδραμεν <WG5143> edramen he ran καὶ <WG2532> kai and προσεκύνησεν <WG4352> prosekynēsen fell on his knees αὐτόν <WG846> auton before Him .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And κράξας <WG2896> kraxas he shouted φωνῇ <WG5456> phōnē in a loud voice μεγάλῃ <WG3173> megalē vvv λέγει <WG3004> legei - , Τί <WG5101> Ti “ What ἐμοὶ <WG1473> emoi with me , καὶ <WG2532> kai - σοί <WG4771> soi do You [want] Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus , Υἱὲ <WG5207> Huie Son τοῦ <WG3588> tou of Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God ? τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Ὑψίστου <WG5310> Hypsistou Most High ὁρκίζω <WG3726> horkizō I beg σε <WG4771> se You τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεόν <WG2316> Theon before God μή <WG3361> mē not με <WG1473> me me ! ” βασανίσῃς <WG928> basanisēs to torture

ἔλεγεν <WG2036> elegen [Jesus] had already declared γὰρ <WG1063> gar For αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , Ἔξελθε <WG1831> Exelthe “ Come τὸ <WG3588> to - πνεῦμα <WG4151> pneuma spirit ! ” τὸ <WG3588> to - , ἀκάθαρτον <WG169> akatharton you unclean ἐκ <WG1537> ek out of τοῦ <WG3588> tou [this] ἀνθρώπου <WG444> anthrōpou man

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἐπηρώτα <WG1905> epērōta [Jesus] asked αὐτόν <WG846> auton . . . . Τί <WG5101> Ti “ What [is] ὄνομά <WG3686> onoma name ? ” σοι <WG4771> soi your Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - λέγει <WG3004> legei vvv αὐτῷ <WG846> autō he replied , Λεγιὼν <WG3003> Legiōn Legion , ” ὄνομά <WG3686> onoma name [is] μοι <WG1473> moi “ My ὅτι <WG3754> hoti “ for πολλοί <WG4183> polloi many . ” ἐσμεν <WG1510> esmen we are

καὶ <WG2532> kai And παρεκάλει <WG3870> parekalei he begged αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Jesus] πολλὰ <WG4183> polla repeatedly ἵνα <WG2443> hina vvv μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv αὐτὰ <WG846> auta them ἀποστείλῃ <WG649> aposteilē not to send ἔξω <WG1854> exō out of τῆς <WG3588> tēs [that] χώρας <WG5561> chōras region .

Ἦν <WG1510> Ēn was δὲ <WG1161> de - ἐκεῖ <WG1563> ekei There πρὸς <WG4314> pros nearby τῷ <WG3588> tō on the ὄρει <WG3735> orei hillside ἀγέλη <WG34> agelē herd χοίρων <WG5519> choirōn of pigs μεγάλη <WG3173> megalē a large βοσκομένη <WG1006> boskomenē feeding .

καὶ <WG2532> kai [So] παρεκάλεσαν <WG3870> parekalesan [the demons] begged αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Jesus] λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes - , Πέμψον <WG3992> Pempson “ Send ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas us εἰς <WG1519> eis to τοὺς <WG3588> tous the χοίρους <WG5519> choirous pigs , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous them . ” εἰσέλθωμεν <WG1525> eiselthōmen we may enter

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἐπέτρεψεν <WG2010> epetrepsen He gave them permission αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐξελθόντα <WG1831> exelthonta came out τὰ <WG3588> ta the πνεύματα <WG4151> pneumata spirits τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἀκάθαρτα <WG169> akatharta unclean εἰσῆλθον <WG1525> eisēlthon [and] went εἰς <WG1519> eis into τοὺς <WG3588> tous the χοίρους <WG5519> choirous pigs , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὥρμησεν <WG3729> hōrmēsen rushed ἡ <WG3588> hē the ἀγέλη <WG34> agelē herd κατὰ <WG2596> kata down τοῦ <WG3588> tou the κρημνοῦ <WG2911> krēmnou steep bank εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn the θάλασσαν <WG2281> thalassan sea ὡς <WG5613> hōs of about δισχίλιοι <WG1367> dischilioi two thousand καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπνίγοντο <WG4155> epnigonto drowned ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the θαλάσσῃ <WG2281> thalassē [water] . ( Literally and were drowned in the sea)

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - οἱ <WG3588> hoi Those βόσκοντες <WG1006> boskontes tending αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous [the pigs] ἔφυγον <WG5343> ephygon ran off καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀπήγγειλαν <WG518> apēngeilan reported [this] εἰς <WG1519> eis in τὴν <WG3588> tēn the πόλιν <WG4172> polin town καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἰς <WG1519> eis - τοὺς <WG3588> tous - ἀγρούς <WG68> agrous countryside , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἦλθον <WG2064> ēlthon [the people] went out ἰδεῖν <WG3708> idein to see τί <WG5101> ti what ἐστιν <WG1510> estin vvv τὸ <WG3588> to vvv γεγονός <WG1096> gegonos had happened .

καὶ <WG2532> kai When ἔρχονται <WG2064> erchontai they came πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton - Ἰησοῦν <WG2424> Iēsoun Jesus , καὶ <WG2532> kai - θεωροῦσιν <WG2334> theōrousin they saw τὸν <WG3588> ton the [man] who δαιμονιζόμενον <WG1139> daimonizomenon had been possessed καθήμενον <WG2521> kathēmenon sitting [there] , ἱματισμένον <WG2439> himatismenon clothed καὶ <WG2532> kai and σωφρονοῦντα <WG4993> sōphronounta in his right mind ; τὸν <WG3588> ton - ἐσχηκότα <WG2192> eschēkota - τὸν <WG3588> ton by the λεγιῶνα <WG3003> legiōna legion of demons καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐφοβήθησαν <WG5399> ephobēthēsan they were afraid .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - διηγήσαντο <WG1334> diēgēsanto described αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . οἱ <WG3588> hoi Those ἰδόντες <WG3708> idontes who had seen [it] πῶς <WG4459> pōs what ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto had happened τῷ <WG3588> tō to the δαιμονιζομένῳ <WG1139> daimonizomenō demon-possessed man καὶ <WG2532> kai and περὶ <WG4012> peri [also to] τῶν <WG3588> tōn the χοίρων <WG5519> choirōn pigs .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἤρξαντο <WG756> ērxanto [the people] began παρακαλεῖν <WG3870> parakalein to beg αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Jesus] ἀπελθεῖν <WG565> apelthein to leave ἀπὸ <WG575> apo . . . τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ὁρίων <WG3725> horiōn region . αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai As ἐμβαίνοντος <WG1684> embainontos was getting αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou He εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸ <WG3588> to the πλοῖον <WG4143> ploion boat , παρεκάλει <WG3870> parekalei begged αὐτὸν <WG846> auton - ὁ <WG3588> ho the [man] δαιμονισθεὶς <WG1139> daimonistheis who had been possessed by the demons ἵνα <WG2443> hina to μετ’ <WG3326> met’ with αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him . ᾖ <WG1510> ē go

καὶ <WG2532> kai But οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἀφῆκεν <WG863> aphēken [Jesus] would not allow αὐτόν <WG846> auton him . ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla - λέγει <WG3004> legei He said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - , Ὕπαγε <WG5217> Hypage “ Go εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv τὸν <WG3588> ton vvv οἶκόν <WG3624> oikon home σου <WG4771> sou . . . πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τοὺς <WG3588> tous - σούς <WG4674> sous your own [people] , ” καὶ <WG2532> kai “ and ἀπάγγειλον <WG518> apangeilon tell αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them ὅσα <WG3745> hosa how much ὁ <WG3588> ho the Κύριός <WG2962> Kyrios Lord σοι <WG4771> soi for you , πεποίηκεν <WG4160> pepoiēken has done καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἠλέησέν <WG1653> ēleēsen what mercy He has shown σε <WG4771> se you . ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai [So] ἀπῆλθεν <WG565> apēlthen [the man] went away καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἤρξατο <WG756> ērxato began κηρύσσειν <WG2784> kēryssein to proclaim ἐν <WG1722> en throughout τῇ <WG3588> tē the Δεκαπόλει <WG1179> Dekapolei Decapolis ( That is, the Ten Cities) ὅσα <WG3745> hosa how much ἐποίησεν <WG4160> epoiēsen had done αὐτῷ <WG846> autō for him . ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai And πάντες <WG3956> pantes everyone ἐθαύμαζον <WG2296> ethaumazon was amazed .

( The Healing Touch of Jesus) ( ( 470 9:18-26 ; 490 8:40-56 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai When διαπεράσαντος <WG1276> diaperasantos had again crossed τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus ἐν <WG1722> en by τῷ <WG3588> tō - πλοίῳ <WG4143> ploiō boat πάλιν <WG3825> palin . . . εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὸ <WG3588> to the πέραν <WG4008> peran other side , συνήχθη <WG4863> synēchthē gathered ὄχλος <WG3793> ochlos crowd πολὺς <WG4183> polys a large ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ around αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἦν <WG1510> ēn - παρὰ <WG3844> para beside τὴν <WG3588> tēn the θάλασσαν <WG2281> thalassan sea .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἔρχεται <WG2064> erchetai arrived , εἷς <WG1520> heis A τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἀρχισυναγώγων <WG752> archisynagōgōn synagogue leader ὀνόματι <WG3686> onomati named Ἰάϊρος <WG2383> Iairos Jairus καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἰδὼν <WG3708> idōn seeing αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Jesus] , πίπτει <WG4098> piptei he fell πρὸς <WG4314> pros at τοὺς <WG3588> tous - πόδας <WG4228> podas feet αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His

καὶ <WG2532> kai and παρακαλεῖ <WG3870> parakalei pleaded with αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him πολλὰ <WG4183> polla urgently λέγων <WG3004> legōn - ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - , Τὸ <WG3588> To - θυγάτριόν <WG2365> thygatrion little daughter μου <WG1473> mou “ My ἐσχάτως <WG2079> eschatōs near death . ἔχει <WG2192> echei is ἵνα <WG2443> hina [Please] ἐλθὼν <WG2064> elthōn come ἐπιθῇς <WG2007> epithēs [and] place τὰς <WG3588> tas [Your] χεῖρας <WG5495> cheiras hands αὐτῇ <WG846> autē on her , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that σωθῇ <WG4982> sōthē she will be healed καὶ <WG2532> kai and ζήσῃ <WG2198> zēsē live . ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai So ἀπῆλθεν <WG565> apēlthen [Jesus] went μετ’ <WG3326> met’ with αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou him , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἠκολούθει <WG190> ēkolouthei followed αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - ὄχλος <WG3793> ochlos crowd πολύς <WG4183> polys a large καὶ <WG2532> kai and συνέθλιβον <WG4918> synethlibon pressed around αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And γυνὴ <WG1135> gynē a woman [was there] οὖσα <WG1510> ousa who had suffered ἐν <WG1722> en vvv ῥύσει <WG4511> rhysei vvv αἵματος <WG129> haimatos from bleeding δώδεκα <WG1427> dōdeka for twelve ἔτη <WG2094> etē years .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - πολλὰ <WG4183> polla much agony παθοῦσα <WG3958> pathousa She had borne ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo under the care of πολλῶν <WG4183> pollōn many ἰατρῶν <WG2395> iatrōn physicians καὶ <WG2532> kai and δαπανήσασα <WG1159> dapanēsasa had spent τὰ <WG3588> ta - παρ’ <WG3844> par’ vvv αὐτῆς <WG846> autēs she had , πάντα <WG3956> panta all καὶ <WG2532> kai but μηδὲν <WG3367> mēden to no ὠφεληθεῖσα <WG5623> ōphelētheisa avail . ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla vvv μᾶλλον <WG3123> mallon Instead , εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv τὸ <WG3588> to vvv χεῖρον <WG5501> cheiron worse . ἐλθοῦσα <WG2064> elthousa [her condition] had only grown

ἀκούσασα <WG191> akousasa When [the woman] heard 〈τὰ〉 <WG3588> ta - περὶ <WG4012> peri about τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus , ἐλθοῦσα <WG2064> elthousa she came up ἐν <WG1722> en through τῷ <WG3588> tō the ὄχλῳ <WG3793> ochlō crowd ὄπισθεν <WG3693> opisthen behind [Him] ἥψατο <WG680> hēpsato [and] touched τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ἱματίου <WG2440> himatiou cloak . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His

ἔλεγεν <WG2036> elegen she kept saying γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - , Ἐὰν <WG1437> Ean “ If only ἅψωμαι <WG680> hapsōmai I touch κἂν <WG2579> kan . . . τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἱματίων <WG2440> himatiōn garments , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His σωθήσομαι <WG4982> sōthēsomai I will be healed . ”

καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv εὐθὺς <WG2112> euthys Immediately ἐξηράνθη <WG3583> exēranthē stopped , ἡ <WG3588> hē - πηγὴ <WG4077> pēgē vvv τοῦ <WG3588> tou vvv αἵματος <WG129> haimatos bleeding αὐτῆς <WG846> autēs her καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔγνω <WG1097> egnō she sensed τῷ <WG3588> tō in [her] σώματι <WG4983> sōmati body ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἴαται <WG2390> iatai she was healed ἀπὸ <WG575> apo of τῆς <WG3588> tēs [her] μάστιγος <WG3148> mastigos affliction .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - εὐθὺς <WG2112> euthys At once ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus ἐπιγνοὺς <WG1921> epignous was aware ἐν <WG1722> en . . . ἑαυτῷ <WG1438> heautō . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn [that] ἐξ <WG1537> ex out from αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him . δύναμιν <WG1411> dynamin power ἐξελθοῦσαν <WG1831> exelthousan had gone ἐπιστραφεὶς <WG1994> epistrapheis Turning ἐν <WG1722> en to τῷ <WG3588> tō the ὄχλῳ <WG3793> ochlō crowd , ἔλεγεν <WG2036> elegen He asked , Τίς <WG5101> Tis “ Who μου <WG1473> mou My ἥψατο <WG680> hēpsato touched τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἱματίων <WG2440> himatiōn garments ? ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἔλεγον <WG2036> elegon answered αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - , οἱ <WG3588> hoi - μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His Βλέπεις <WG991> Blepeis “ You can see τὸν <WG3588> ton the ὄχλον <WG3793> ochlon crowd συνθλίβοντά <WG4918> synthlibonta pressing in on σε <WG4771> se You , καὶ <WG2532> kai and yet λέγεις <WG3004> legeis You ask , Τίς <WG5101> Tis ‘ Who μου <WG1473> mou Me ? ’ ” ἥψατο <WG680> hēpsato touched
